experience.title: Research Analyst- Sales, Marketing and Communications
experience.description: - Employing primary and secondary research techniques to analyze key business challenges of clients- Using analytical tools such as root cause analysis to identify the drivers of client’s business problems, creating hypotheses regarding solutions, and testing differences between conventional and progressive practice. - Key product deliverables include execution support toolkits, whitepapers, case studies, insight pages and frameworks- Supporting content Marketing by writing blogs and content to support newsletters and editorial calendars as requested to help program hit key Management Objectives.
